attributes.action: explain their claims cannabis causes schizophrenia
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are being lied to - and the government owes us an apology.

Please to prove to us that you are working FOR us rather than AGAINST us can you please produce the evidence that cannabis causes schizophrenia - your own Home Office statistics show that while cannabis use has risen over the past few years there has been NO comparable increase in schizophrenia. This indicates no causative link between the two.

Is it not true that "a link" might simply be that people who are schizophrenic like smoking cannabis?

Our question is simple: Please explain who is lying to us - the Home Office or you

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Statements that don't actually request any action
